{{ko|'''원신 Cafe in Seoul'''|tl=Genshin Impact Cafe in Seoul}} is a [[Genshin Impact]] official coffee shop operated by [[HoYoverse]].

The cafe serves dishes that reproduce game dishes, and sells merchandise, including limited editions. The store is located in a building named {{ko|티바트타워|tl=Tivat Tower.}}

==Themes==
There have been '''3''' themes since ''Genshin Impact Cafe in Seoul''{{'}}s opening.

===Faruzan===
The cafe was [https://x.com/Genshin_Cafe_KR/status/1727899843933143319 announced] for opening under the [[Faruzan]] theme on Nov 24, 2023.
<gallery>
Genshin Impact Cafe in Seoul (Faruzan).png|Faruzan Theme and cafe opening's announcement
</gallery>

===Hu Tao===
The cafe's second theme with [[Hu Tao]] as its focus was [https://x.com/Genshin_Cafe_KR/status/1784550427532591106 announced] for release on May 4, 2024.
<gallery>
Genshin Impact Cafe in Seoul (Hu Tao).png|Hu Tao Theme's announcement
</gallery>

===Wanderer===
The cafe's second theme with [[Wanderer]] as its focus was [https://x.com/Genshin_Cafe_KR/status/1813171719655596448 announced] for release on August 9, 2024.
<gallery>
Genshin Impact Cafe in Seoul (Wanderer) 2.png|Wanderer Theme's announcement
</gallery>
